name: Brain Primary Tumor Location
title: Brain Primary Tumor Location
notes:
**Note 1:** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years 2024+
* For cases diagnosed 2018-2023, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** A data item is needed to distinguish between the Pons and all other subsites within the Brain Stem (C717). Code the site in which the tumor arose. 
* Review of radiology reports and physicianâ€™s notes are needed to determine the appropriate code. Needle biopsies and surgery are usually too dangerous for these types of tumors, so the best information will be available from radiology reports
rows:
Subsite other than Pons
 * Basis peduncle
 * Cerebral peduncle
 * Choroid plexus of fourth ventricle
 * Fourth ventricle, NOS
 * Infratentorial brain, NOS
 * Medulla oblongata
 * Midbrain
 * Olive
 * Pyramid

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this item is required by your standard setter, use of code 8 will result in an edit error.)

Brain stem, NOS
Unknown subsite of Brain Stem

Primary Site is NOT C717
Diagnosis year is prior to 2024
